song.title: Revelations
song.info:
REVELATIONS - 6'50
by Iron Maiden - Cover by Malekith Tracked for "BEST OF THE FANS II" musicdisk
One of my favorite Maiden songs, I first wanted to track it for BOTF 1 but I didn't have enough good samples to do an "above-average" mod. Then I found some good metal mods, I asked permission to rip some samples (mainly solo guitar and drums) and now, here it is...
Clean guitar parts redone with Hybrido's pack. I kept the original samples 'cos i wasn't gonna do the whole module again (something else to do :-)) Original samples by Zack and Betrayer.
contact me : malekith@listen.to ICQ : 49731906 my site : http://listen.to/malekith
